summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of June 1, 2017, to June 30, 2017. It details the account balance, service charges, and criteria for waiving those charges, indicating the financial status of the entity during that time.

persons.name: Shocker Holdings LLC
persons.context: Shocker Holdings LLC is the entity associated with the bank account detailed in the statement.

keyFacts: The bank statement covers the period from June 1, 2017, to June 30, 2017.
The beginning balance of the account was $4,854.45.
The statement indicates that the standard monthly service charge was waived due to meeting balance criteria.
The account is associated with Shocker Holdings LLC, which is located at 27 High Tech Blvd, Thomasville, NC.
The document includes details about overdraft coverage and service charge policies.
